input_text.Prompt:
Product name:
Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System

Product keywords:
1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank
1/2 hp; max. Flow rate is 420 gallons per hour; (50 psi)
3/4 in. Npt discharge with 1-1/4 in. Suction
Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V)
Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation
Assembled in US with foreign and domestic parts
Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is durable! 1/2 HP cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system (includes SWS50) that is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. 3/4 in. NPT discharge with 1 1/4 in. suction. Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V). Max flow rate is 420 GPH at 0 ft. (50 PSI). Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 PSI for automatic operation. Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.
input_text.Response B: The Wayne SWS50-12P is a 1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump convention tank system with a 12-gallon horizontal tank. The pump is designed for wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth. The system is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. The motor is a dual voltage (120V/240V) high-efficiency square flange motor that is factory set for 240V. The pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation. The max flow rate is 420 gallons per hour at a pressure of 50 psi. The discharge is 3/4 in. NPT and the suction is 1/4 in.
